pkgmetadata.longdescription: ## Modules### server#### API- api: For all API modules #### modules- bcpnp: BCPNP applications- lmia: LMIA applications- pr: PR applications- tr: TR applications#### system- data: all excel, pdf,word templates, etc... used by the system- doc: docs, but did not do it so far- system: config and models index### client- client: apps used in terminal with http accessing to api- local: apps used in terminal with local accessing to modules### source- source: excel app- basemodels: all fundemental models- utils### test- tests: test apps
